p: The, 6–8-week-old male BALB/c mice (FSRI SRC VB “VECTOR”, Koltsovo, Russia) were randomly distributed into 3 groups ( n = 10 per group). Mice were twice (prime boost) immunized subcutaneously (i.s.) with 0.25 mL Ultrix ® vaccine (SPBNIIVS, Saint Petersburg, Russia) containing purified surface antigens from the influenza strain B/Colorado/06/2017 (lineage B/Victoria/2/87).
